attributes.action: put procedures in place so all past and present Gurkhas who have served in the British Armed Forces are allowed to live in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you think all past and present Gurkhas who have served in the British Armed Forces should be allowed to live in the United Kingdom please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
